head.title: City Summer School Has Low Attendance

meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

hedline.hl1: City Summer School Has Low Attendance

block.p: Despite an intensive attendance campaign, nearly 40 percent of students in kindergarten though 12th grade are missing from the most ambitious summer school program in New York City's history. The poor showing could prove a costly and embarrassing indication of just how hard it is to make a difference for children in a system as big and as complex as the city's. Article, Page B1.
